fields.summary: Update the command usage of NNThroughputBenchmark by adding the "-blockSize" option.
fields.description: In HDFS-15652, make block size from NNThroughputBenchmark configurable. Benchmarking.md should also be updated.

comments.body:
fuchaohong opened a new pull request, #7711:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7711

   In [HDFS-15652](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDFS-15652), make block size from NNThroughputBenchmark configurable. Benchmarking.md should also be updated.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #7711:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7711#issuecomment-3272751907

   We're closing this stale PR because it has been open for 100 days with no activity. This isn't a judgement on the merit of the PR in any way. It's just a way of keeping the PR queue manageable.
   If you feel like this was a mistake, or you would like to continue working on it, please feel free to re-open it and ask for a committer to remove the stale tag and review again.
   Thanks all for your contribution.
